title: Hallmark-Lucky Christmas [2011]
description:
Hallmark-Lucky Christmas [2011]

Air Date: 14 Dec 2011

Summary: Lucky Christmas is the story of Holly Ceroni, a single mom trying to get back on her feet, but who is crushed to learn her winning lottery ticket is in the glove compartment of her recently stolen car. Mike Ronowski, the construction worker behind Holly's missing property, goes along with a master plan to befriend Holly and coerce her into giving him half of her winnings. Mike unexpectedly falls in love with Holly and learns there are more important things in life than quick money in time for the holidays.


Cast:

Elizabeth Berkley ... Holly Ceroni 

Jason Gray-Stanford ... Mike Ronowski 

Robert Huculak ... Bob Ronowski 

Alicia Johnston ... Kelly Ronowski 

Mitchell Kummen ... Max Ceroni 

Kyle Nobess ... Fireman 

Kelly Wolfman ... Devon Hart 


Note: This is an exception since it is a Christmas Movie.
